gold_answers: Ove (Prevent partial) is a fifty-nine-year-old man who conducts daily inspections in his neighborhood, checking things like the trash room and the parking area. He is portrayed as a somewhat grumpy and meticulous individual who has a strong sense of responsibility, even for tasks that are not technically his. He has a contentious relationship with a cat he encounters during his inspections, and he expresses frustration with the people around him, particularly regarding their priorities, such as taking lunch breaks. (Sources: otto.pdf)
ove is a good man but a little bit hard to comprehend. (Sources: otto.pdf)
